description:
Sunny Peace is up against http://anidb.net/ch111733 [TRINITYAiLE] for the semi-finals. Sunny Peace performs a brand new song with http://anidb.net/ch111715 [Sakura]`s new singing style that doesn`t sound like http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana]`s. Van Production`s president, http://anidb.net/ch114694 [Asakura], is revealed to be http://anidb.net/ch111725 [Rui]`s father.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Place That Cannot Be Reached Alone
自分だけじゃ辿り着けない場所
